desc: 光属性ユニットからの被ダメージを５％軽減

dictionary.lore: When the war with the gods began, it is said many people fell to the holy attacks of the gods' messengers. In order to put a stop to this, the La Veda Republic, with the assistance of a magician familiar with dark magic, produced a piece of equipment that protects its wearer from light attacks. Though its efficacy wasn't perfect, it helped to reduce casualties among the knights who wore it.

name: 光装キリエ・メイヴ
